import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get agent's trades"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/agent/{agent_id}/trades/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets the trades of agent. The trades are paginated
            and the page number can be specified using the query parameter
            `page`. The default page number is 1. Each page will have 100 trades

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"agent_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","title":"Agent Id"}},{"name":"page","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"default":1,"title":"Page"}},{"name":"x-fere-userid","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","title":"X-Fere-Userid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
